jcr:content.jcr:title: G231 - Leeloo
jcr:content.seoDescription: Logitech G231 gaming headset delivers stereo sound and a unidirectional mic a lightweight design perfect for long gaming sessions..
jcr:content.seoPageTitle: Logitech G231 Prodigy Gaming Headset with Unidirectional Mic

media_tile.text: Whether you game on PC or console, the G231 has you covered. One pair is all you need to get great gaming audio, however you choose to play.

media_tile_654806920.text: With 40 mm neodymium drivers, G230 delivers crisp, clear stereo sound that makes your game come alive.

media_tile_777233576.text: Marathon gaming sessions mean heat and sweat. We covered the G231 ear cups with carefully selected high performance cloth for a comfortable, soft touch even after hours of use. And they slip off easily for washing to keep the headset in top shape.

media_tile_842265300_1678672589.text: Earpieces have been designed to be slim and light, without skimping on audio quality. A lighter, balanced assembly means you stay focused on the game. You might even forget you’re wearing a headset.

media_tile_842265300.text: Be heard loud and clear without the distraction of background noise. Adjust the mic to pick up only your voice so your teammates can hear you loud and clear.

media_tile_1548322686.text: Keep the mute switch and volume dial close at hand for quick, precise audio adjustments. All attached to a 2-meter cable.

media_tile_154832268.text: For a personalized fit, the earpieces swivel up to 90 degrees. And because they can turn to lay flat, they’re less prone to breakage from everyday wear and tear.

_x0032_.text: PC splitter for separate mic and headphone jacks
Some console controllers require an adapter for audio cable input.

_x0031_3.text: Audio Controls: Volume control, Microphone mute
